# Accuracy (Spell)

[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]
**Level:** [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Warmage Spells|Warmage 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]], [[1st Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen 1]]
**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]
**Casting Time:** 1 standard action
**Components:** V, S, M (ink used to scribe a mystical character on each weapon affected by the spell)
**Range:** Touch
**Targets:** One thrown weapon/level touched or one projectile weapon touched
**Duration:** 10 minutes/level
**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless, object)
**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless, object)
**Source:** Complete Arcane (WotC), pg. 96

When you cast this spell, you enhance one or more thrown weapons or one projectile weapon to improve its chance of hitting distant targets. For the duration of the spell, the range increment for the affected weapon or weapons is doubled.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 1, Wizard 1 to Level.
